alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong winds behind line of storms in northeast Iowa... At 1141 PM CDT, strong winds were being reported behind the line of storms moving through northeast Iowa. These winds will last for 20 to 30 minutes before lessening. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Automated observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oelwein, West Union, Elkader, Postville, Monona, Fayette, Strawberry Point, Calmar, Ossian, Elgin, Clermont, Maynard, Hawkeye, Arlington, Fort Atkinson, Farmersburg, Volga, Hardin, Luana and Wadena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa.
